sections.heading: Loss, extinction, or destruction of propertyThe usufruct of nonconsumables terminates by the permanent and total loss, extinction, or destruction through accident,force majeureor decay of the property subject to the usufruct
sections.text: Acts 1976, No. 103, ยง1; Acts 2010, No. 881, ยง1, eff. July 2, 2010.
